name: Minecraft: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy Skin Pack
summary: Minecraft: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy Skin Pack was a skin pack for Minecraft that contained 24 skins and was released on September 5, 2014, for the Xbox 360 and Xbox One and was available until December 21, 2015.
